basics.name: Ziyin Zhang
basics.label: Graduate Student, SJTU
basics.summary: Hi guys, I'm a graduate student in Computer Science and Technology with a passion for machine learning, linear algebra, and linguistics. I also love nature, sports, movies, American TV shows and Chinese-style music!

education.major: Working on Master of Science in Computer Science and Technology.
education.course: Statistical Learning and Inference (95/100), Matrix Theory (to be graded)

education.major: Majored in Naval Architecture and Ocean Engineering as a freshman, ranked 1/210, transferred to Computer Science and Technology as a sophomore, also minored in Translation and Interpretation.
education.course: A total of 81 courses and 200 credits, including Discrete Mathematics (99/100), Operating System (95/100), Computer System Architecture (95/100), Principles of Compiler (97/100), Computer Networking (98/100), Principles of Data Science (100/100), Artificial Intelligence (98/100), Machine Learning (97/100), Natural Language Processing (98.5/100), Data Mining (97/100), Basic Latin (98/100), and Interpretation (98/100).
